title: Overflow and underflow in dot product
body_html:
This code

import torch as tr
u = tr.FloatTensor([0.5708, 0.4292])
print(u @ u, (u * u).sum())

outputs

0.0   0.5100252777338028

at the same time as

w = tr.FloatTensor([ 0.57076412,  0.42923594])
print(w @ w)

prints

3.6893488147419103e+19

MacOS, Python 3.6.2, tr.__version__ = 0.2.0_4,

body:
This code 
```
import torch as tr
u = tr.FloatTensor([0.5708, 0.4292])
print(u @ u, (u * u).sum())
```
outputs 
```
0.0   0.5100252777338028
```

at the same time as 
```
w = tr.FloatTensor([ 0.57076412,  0.42923594])
print(w @ w)
```
prints 
```
3.6893488147419103e+19
```

MacOS, Python 3.6.2,  `tr.__version__ = 0.2.0_4`,
